page.title: 08DAY TO DAY LIFE IN BARSBY
page.content: Most of the of the people who live in Barsby are either retired, farmers or commutors to Leicester or Melton Mowbray. There is a high percentage of old people in Barsby who have lived there all there lives. One women called Mrs Jesson allowed us to interview her on how she saw life in Barsby. Mrs Jesson has lived in Barsby for thirteen years. Since Mrs Jesson has moved to Barsby all the shops have closed down the bus service stopped, and the old local pub has been modernised out of all recognition. Many of the houses in Barsby have been renovated and updated, but thankfully most of these have retained the original character of the building. Mrs Jesson feels that the pace of life is slow compared to that of the city people. everyone doing their own thing in there own time.
